ICU data with R 0.4.0

Changelog

ricu 0.3.0 Unreleased

  • revamped src_env setup

ricu 0.2.1 Unreleased

  • concept harmonization (mostly aumc and hirid uom fixes)
  • split of setup_src_data() from setup_src_env() for convenient setup in non-interactive scenarios

ricu 0.2.0 Unreleased

  • add aumc data source

ricu 0.1.3 2021-01-29

  • concept fixes (susp_inf, non-hadm loading of abx on mimic, map on hirid)
  • fix CRAN policy violation

ricu 0.1.2 2020-11-03

  • restructure SOFA computation
  • add concept caching
  • add \value{} entries to docs

ricu 0.1.1 Unreleased

  • make CRAN compliant (.GlobalEnv default in attach_src())
  • concept fixes: weight, vasopressors & height

ricu 0.1.0 Unreleased

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
  • CRAN submission

Contents

Developed by Nicolas Bennett, Drago Plecko, Ida-Fong Ukor.
